Package LabBlockChain.BlockChain.LabCoin

Class BlockChainImplement

java.lang.Object
LabBlockChain.BlockChain.LabCoin.BlockChainImplement
All Implemented Interfaces:
BlockChainInterface
public class BlockChainImplement
extends Object
implements BlockChainInterface
generate transaction signature broadcast verified and accepted by all peers verify mined Node and add to blockchain be verified by enough blocks

    generate genesisBlock The genesis Block's index starts from 1, timestamp is current time, transaction is null, nouce is 1, previous hash string and hash string equals to 1

      public boolean isValidBlock​(Block curBlock, Block prevBlock)
      the new Block is valid or not the current prevHash should equals to the calculateHash of the previous block the current index should be the previous index+1 the current calculateHash should 1) match calculateHash calculation: equals to the SHA256 calculateHash of PreviousHash, Transactions, Nonce 2) match Proof-of-work: start with [0] * DIFFICULTY
      Specified by:
      isValidBlock in interface BlockChainInterface
      Parameters:
      curBlock - current block
      prevBlock - previous block
